|tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=WNR2004 |default_ssid_regex=^WNR2004$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=UNIDEN |default_pass= |oui=00:30:AB |oui_eth=00:30:AB |default_ch= }} [http://www.uniden.com/content/ebiz/uniden/resources/ownersmanuals/WNR2004om.pdf Manual] OEM Delta Networks, invalid FCC ID [http://www.dslreports.com/forum/remark,9420325 Mention on DSLReports]
[http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/index.html On the HRI hardware table] :Notes the device as using '''Nucleus RTOS''' "DR-E604W", "2976204004" is silkscreened on the board. The power adapter included with the device is a ''Direct Plug-In Power Supply'' model YP-040, AD-1000 (7.5V, 1A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Images== File:Uniden WNR2004 board top.jpg|board top [[Has images::internal| ]]
